CustomField.description: Contact Status when the Contact Stage is set to "Lost" for Lost Reasons other than 'Bad Email', 'Bad Phone', 'Bad Email & Bad Phone', and 'Changed Organization'. Created this field for reporting purposes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contact Status when the Contact Stage is set to "Lost" for Lost Reasons other than 'Bad Email', 'Bad Phone', 'Bad Email & Bad Phone', and 'Changed Organization'. Created this field for reporting purposes.
CustomField.label: Lost Contact Status
